title: Home and Away spoilers: Mackenzie and Karen in showdown over Rick
text:
Karen and Mackenzie are faced with each other (Picture: Channel 5)

Karen (Georgia Adamson) has returned to the Bay, much to Dean’s (Patrick O’Connor) surprise, and although he has been trying to keep his mum away from Mackenzie (Emily Weir), it isn’t long before she goes to Salt asking for a job. While Mackenzie tries to tell her she wouldn’t want to work at Salt, Karen soon takes offence, and Dean is eventually forced to tell her that Mackenzie is Rick Booth’s (Mark Lee) daughter.

As predicted, Karen explodes, and Dean and Mac try to diffuse the situation. However, Karen won’t be calmed down, instead going nuclear in the Surf Club. Ziggy (Sophie Dillman) goes after her to try and explain, but Karen is filled with rage and won’t listen to anyone.

Dean tries to talk to her, but Karen is furious that he’s been lying to her, and feels he has betrayed her by becoming friends with one of Rick Booth’s children. The two get into another huge fight, which ends with Karen declaring she’s going to leave town.

Karen isn’t happy that Dean lied to her (Picture: Channel 5)

Dean decides there’s no point in trying to reason with her while she’s in such a mood, but Mackenzie decides to take action. Despite Ziggy asking if she has a death wish, she goes to find Karen and discovers her attempting to hitchhike out of town.

She tries to talk to Karen, who refuses to engage with her. When Mackenzie says they both have a common enemy in Rick Booth, she is distracted by her feelings of anger and betrayal. But will this be enough for Mackenzie to talk Dean’s mum around?

Meanwhile, Dean has finished up a surf when he decides not to leave his mum to it and instead to go and look for her. He’s devastated when Ziggy informs him Mackenzie went to to find Karen, and when he sees the two women returning to the Surf Club, he braces for an explosion…
